subject: Fashion
title: The Sports Bra Invention
description: A quick win: understand The Sports Bra Invention.

hook.text: In 1977, Lisa Lindahl went running and couldn't find a single bra that didn't cause pain.

buildup.text: She called costume designer Hinda Miller. They brainstormed designs but nothing worked.

discovery.text: Miller's husband jokingly strapped two jockstraps to his chest. They staredâ€”then built exactly that.

twist.text: The 'Jogbra' was sewn from two jockstraps. It became the first sports bra sold commercially.

climax.text: Brandi Chastain's 1999 World Cup celebration in a sports bra made it an icon of female athletic power.

punchline.text: Two jockstraps changed women's sports forever.

quiz.question: What was the prototype of the first commercial sports bra made from?
options: Two jockstraps stitched together as a joke that worked
A modified men's undershirt cut to provide support
Elastic bandages typically used for sports injuries
